author: Xbox
description:

title: The Eikonc Xbox

author: Xbox
description:
In this episode of the Official Xbox Podcast, we're diving deep into Skybound's brutal world full of superheroes in Invincible VS. This 3v3 tag fighter has characters from all across the Invincible comics and series and has them beating the heck out of each other and destroying everything in-between.

00:00 Introduction
03:13 Trailer Discussion
05:58 Working With Kirkman and Skybound
08:13 Gameplay Walkthrough
14:35 Why a 3v3 Tag Fighter?
16:35 By the FGC, For the FGC
20:20 Final Thoughts

Listen to us on Spotify/Apple Podcasts 🎧 
https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/officialxboxpodcast

title: Xbox Games Showcase Deep Dive | Invincible VS

author: Xbox
description:
This must-play classic from ATLUS launches June 19 and returns with revamped visuals, QOL updates, new VO, and an overhauled battle system.

Navigate the historic streets of a fantastical 1930s era in Tokyo or delve into the haunting Dark Realm where demons lie in wait. With over 120 demons to summon, choose your allies wisely to prevent humanity from being consumed by darkness.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/raidou-remastered-the-mystery-of-the-soulless-army/9nx3566l9nh9

author: Xbox
description:
A brand new, next-gen open-world creature-catching ARPG called Aniimo is coming. Now you have the chance to join the game and meet all those cute Aniimo.

Wait! There are even some in the footage of this trailer!? What a nice surprise! 

Come and meet all these cute Aniimo on Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/aniimo/9PK8PHLCQDF6/0010"

author: Xbox
description:
Playable demo out today!

Get an early look at the game, and start exploring the original manga and anime storystory of the manga and anime, and new game-original quests!
(Save data from the demo can be imported to carry over progress in the full game.)
